Package equipments.CookingPlate

Class CookingPlate

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
equipments.CookingPlate.CookingPlate
All Implemented Interfaces:
CookingPlateImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI
public class CookingPlate extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent implements CookingPlateImplementationI
The class CookingPlate implements the cooking plate component.

Description TODO

The cooking plate is an uncontrollable appliance, hence it does not connect with the household energy manager. However, it will connect later to the electric panel to take its (simulated) electricity consumption into account.

White-box Invariant

 invariant      currentState != null
 invariant      currentMode != null

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES
